name: beyondtrust-privileged-remote-access
label: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access
description: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access controls, manages, and audits privileged accounts and credentials. This enables just-in-time, zero trust access to on-premises and cloud resources by internal, external, and third-party users.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: host
fields.tooltip: URL of the BeyondTrust server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: URL of the BeyondTrust server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: client_id
fields.tooltip: Client ID of the BeyondTrust server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Client ID of the BeyondTrust server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: client_secret
fields.tooltip: Client Secret used to access the BeyondTrust server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.description: Client Secret used to access the BeyondTrust server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Account List From Vault
operations.description: Retrieves a list of accounts from vault in BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name, type, account group, and any other details you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify name of account to retrieve from vault that match the given name.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify name of account to retrieve from vault that match the given name.

parameters.name: include_personal
parameters.title: Include Personal
parameters.tooltip: Specify whether you want to include personal accounts in response. By default it retrieves only shared accounts.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify whether you want to include personal accounts in response. By default it retrieves only shared accounts.

parameters.name: type
parameters.title: Account Type
parameters.tooltip: Select a account type that you want to retrieve from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: (Optional) Select a account type that you want to retrieve from BeyondTrust. You can choose from Password and SSH.

parameters.name: account_group_id
parameters.title: Account Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Filters results to include only accounts that match the given vault account group.
parameters.description: (Optional) Filters results to include only accounts that match the given vault account group.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. It should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Create Account in Vault
operations.description: Creates an account in BeyondTrust vault.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify name of vault account to be created.
parameters.description: Specify name of vault account to be created.

parameters.name: username
parameters.title: Username
parameters.tooltip: Specify the username that will be injected and/or checked out from vault in BeyondTrust
parameters.description: Specify the username that will be injected and/or checked out from vault in BeyondTrust

parameters.name: type
parameters.title: Account Type
parameters.tooltip: Specify type of account to be created in BeyondTrust vault.
parameters.description: Specify type of account to be created in BeyondTrust vault.

Password.name: password
Password.title: Password
Password.tooltip: Specify the password that will be injected and/or checked out form vault.
Password.description: Specify the password that will be injected and/or checked out form vault.

Password.name: account_policy
Password.title: Account Policy Name
Password.tooltip: Specify The code name of the Account Policy associated with the account. When the value is not provided, the account policy is inherited from the account group. If there is no account group, it is inherited from the global default.
Password.description: (Optional) Specify The code name of the Account Policy associated with the account. When the value is not provided, the account policy is inherited from the account group. If there is no account group, it is inherited from the global default.

SSH.name: private_key
SSH.title: Private Key
SSH.tooltip: Specify the private SSH key that will be injected from vault.
SSH.description: Specify the private SSH key that will be injected from vault.

SSH.name: private_key_passphrase
SSH.title: Passphrase
SSH.tooltip: Specify the passphrase used to unlock the private key.
SSH.description: (Optional) Specify the passphrase used to unlock the private key.

SSH.name: private_key_public_cert
SSH.title: Public Certificate
SSH.tooltip: Specify the public certificate used for authentication.
SSH.description: (Optional) Specify the public certificate used for authentication.

parameters.name: description
parameters.title: Description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of account to be created in vault.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the description of account to be created in vault.

parameters.name: account_group_id
parameters.title: Account Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unique identifier the Vault Account Group. It is defaults to 1, which is the default Account Group.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the unique identifier the Vault Account Group. It is defaults to 1, which is the default Account Group.

operations.title: Delete Account From Vault
operations.description: Deletes a accounts from vault in BeyondTrust. Note: This action cannot delete personal account.

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.name: account_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of account to delete from vault.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of account to delete from vault.

operations.title: Checkin or Checkout Credentials From Vault
operations.description: Checkin or checkout private key or password From Vault in BeyondTrust.

parameters.title: Operation
parameters.name: operation
parameters.tooltip: Select operation you want to do on password or private key from account in vault.
parameters.description: Select operation you want to do on password or private key from account in vault. You can choose from 'Check In' or 'Check Out'

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.name: account_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of account of which password or private key you want to checkout from vault.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of account of which password or private key you want to checkout from vault.

operations.title: Get Vault Account Policy List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of account policies from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name and pagination parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Policy Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify name of account policy which to be retrieved from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify name of account policy which to be retrieved from BeyondTrust. Note: policy name are always matched case-insensitively and exactly. No partial matches are allowed.

parameters.name: code_name
parameters.title: Policy Code Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify code name of account policy which to be retrieved from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify code name of account which to be retrieved from BeyondTrust. Note: policy name are always matched case-insensitively and exactly. No partial matches are allowed.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. It should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Get Vault Account Group List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of account groups from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name and pagination parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Group Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify name of account group which to be retrieved from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify name of account group which to be retrieved from BeyondTrust. Note: group name are always matched case-insensitively and exactly. No partial matches are allowed.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. It should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Get User List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like username, email ID, security provider ID and any other details you have specified.

parameters.name: username
parameters.title: Username
parameters.tooltip: Specify username to retrieve user from BeyondTrust that match the given username.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify username to retrieve user from BeyondTrust that match the given username.

parameters.name: email_address
parameters.title: Email ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify email ID of user to retrieve from BeyondTrust that match the given email ID.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify email ID of user to retrieve from BeyondTrust that match the given email ID.

parameters.name: security_provider_id
parameters.title: Security Provider ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify security provider ID of the users you want to retrieve from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify security provider ID of the users you want to retrieve from BeyondTrust.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. It should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Get Vault Endpoint List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of vault endpoints from vault in BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name, hostname, domain name and any other details you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Endpoint Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify name of endpoint to retrieve endpoints that match the given name.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify name of endpoint to retrieve endpoints that match the given name.

parameters.name: hostname
parameters.title: Host Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify hostname of endpoint to retrieve endpoints that match the given hostname.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify hostname of endpoint to retrieve endpoints that match the given hostname.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify domain name of endpoint to retrieve endpoints that match the given domain name.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify domain name of endpoint to retrieve endpoints that match the given domain name.

parameters.name: description
parameters.title: Description
parameters.tooltip: Specify description of endpoint to retrieve endpoints that match the given description.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify description of endpoint to retrieve endpoints that match the given description.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. It should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Get Vendor Group List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of vendor groups from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name and pagination parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Vendor Group Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify name of vendor group which to be retrieved from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify name of vendor group which to be retrieved from BeyondTrust.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. It should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Create Vendor Group
operations.description: Creates a vendor group in BeyondTrust based specified input parameters.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Vendor Group Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of vendor group to be created.
parameters.description: Specify name of vendor group to be created.

parameters.name: default_policy
parameters.title: Policy ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group policy ID associated with the vendor group. Note: The group policy cannot grant administrative privileges.
parameters.description: Specify the group policy ID associated with the vendor group. Note: The group policy cannot grant administrative privileges.

parameters.name: administrator_id
parameters.title: Administrator ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of the Privileged Remote Access user who is emailed if notifications are enabled or user approvals are required. The user must have a valid email and SMTP server configured to receive emails.
parameters.description: The ID of the Privileged Remote Access user who is emailed if notifications are enabled or user approvals are required. The user must have a valid email and SMTP server configured to receive emails.

parameters.name: account_expiration
parameters.title: Accounts Expire After
parameters.tooltip: Specify the duration(in days) after user accounts in the vendor group expire. By default, this parameter is set to 30 days.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the duration(in days) after user accounts in the vendor group expire. By default, this parameter is set to 30 days. Should be between 1 and 365.

parameters.name: user_added_notification_enabled
parameters.title: Notify the PRA User when a user is added
parameters.tooltip: If enabled, the Privileged Remote Access user will receive notifications whenever a user is added to the vendor group. Note: cannot be set to 'false' if the 'Require PRA User approval to activate users' parameter is set to 'true'. In such cases, the 'Administrator ID' parameter becomes mandatory and must be provided when enabling this feature.
parameters.description: If enabled, the Privileged Remote Access user will receive notifications whenever a user is added to the vendor group. Note: cannot be set to 'false' if the 'Require PRA User approval to activate users' parameter is set to 'true'. In such cases, the 'Administrator ID' parameter becomes mandatory and must be provided when enabling this feature.

parameters.name: user_expired_notification_enabled
parameters.title: Notify the PRA User when a user has expired
parameters.tooltip: If enabled, the Privileged Remote Access user is notified when a user has expired in the vendor group. Note: This value cannot be true if 'Notify the PRA User when a user is added' parameter is false.
parameters.description: If enabled, the Privileged Remote Access user is notified when a user has expired in the vendor group. Note: This value cannot be true if 'Notify the PRA User when a user is added' parameter is false.

parameters.name: user_approval_enabled
parameters.title: Require PRA User approval to activate users
parameters.tooltip: If enabled, approval by a Privileged Remote Access user is required to activate users in the vendor group. Note: The 'Administrator ID' parameter is required when this value is true.
parameters.description: If enabled, approval by a Privileged Remote Access user is required to activate users in the vendor group. Note: The 'Administrator ID' is required when this value is true.

true.name: user_reactivation_enabled
true.title: Require PRA User approval to extend or reactivate users
true.tooltip: If enabled, approval by a Privileged Remote Access user is required to extend or reactivate users in the vendor group.
true.description: If enabled, approval by a Privileged Remote Access user is required to extend or reactivate users in the vendor group.

parameters.name: network_restrictions
parameters.title: Network Address Allow List
parameters.tooltip: Specify the network address allow list related to network restrictions. you can specify multiple network addresses using comma separator.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the network address allow list related to network restrictions. you can specify multiple network addresses using comma separator.

operations.title: Get Vendor Group Details
operations.description: Retrieves vendor group details based on specified Vendor Group ID from BeyondTrust.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of vendor group which to be retrieved from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: Specify ID of vendor group which to be retrieved from BeyondTrust.

operations.title: Update Vendor Group
operations.description: Updates a vendor group in BeyondTrust based specified input parameters.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of vendor group which to be updated.
parameters.description: Specify ID of vendor group which to be updated.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Vendor Group Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify new name of the vendor group.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify new name of the vendor group.

parameters.name: default_policy
parameters.title: Policy ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group policy ID associated with the vendor group. Note: The group policy cannot grant administrative privileges.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the group policy ID associated with the vendor group. Note: The group policy cannot grant administrative privileges.

parameters.name: account_expiration
parameters.title: Accounts Expire After
parameters.tooltip: Specify the amount of time until the user accounts expire in the vendor group. The unit of time measured is in days. By default it is set to 30.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the amount of time until the user accounts expire in the vendor group. The unit of time measured is in days. By default it is set to 30. Should be between 1 and 365.

parameters.name: user_added_notification_enabled
parameters.title: Notify the PRA User when a user is added
parameters.tooltip: If enabled, the Privileged Remote Access user is notified when a user is added to the vendor group. This value cannot be false if user_approval_enabled is true. The administrator_id is required when this value is true.
parameters.description: If enabled, the Privileged Remote Access user is notified when a user is added to the vendor group. This value cannot be false if user_approval_enabled is true. The administrator_id is required when this value is true.

parameters.name: user_expired_notification_enabled
parameters.title: Notify the PRA User when a user has expired
parameters.tooltip: If enabled, the Privileged Remote Access user is notified when a user has expired in the vendor group. This value cannot be true if user_added_notification_enable is false.
parameters.description: If enabled, the Privileged Remote Access user is notified when a user has expired in the vendor group. This value cannot be true if user_added_notification_enable is false.

parameters.name: user_approval_enabled
parameters.title: Require PRA User approval to activate users
parameters.tooltip: If enabled, approval by a Privileged Remote Access user is required to activate users in the vendor group. The administrator_id is required when this value is true.
parameters.description: If enabled, approval by a Privileged Remote Access user is required to activate users in the vendor group. The administrator_id is required when this value is true.

true.name: user_reactivation_enabled
true.title: Require PRA User approval to extend or reactivate users
true.tooltip: If enabled, approval by a Privileged Remote Access user is required to extend or reactivate users in the vendor group.
true.description: If enabled, approval by a Privileged Remote Access user is required to extend or reactivate users in the vendor group.

parameters.name: administrator_id
parameters.title: Administrator ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of the Privileged Remote Access user who is emailed if notifications are enabled or user approvals are required. The user must have a valid email and SMTP server configured to receive emails.
parameters.description: (Optional) The ID of the Privileged Remote Access user who is emailed if notifications are enabled or user approvals are required. The user must have a valid email and SMTP server configured to receive emails.

parameters.name: network_restrictions
parameters.title: Network Address Allow List
parameters.tooltip: Specify the network address allow list related to network restrictions. you can specify multiple network addresses using comma separator.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the network address allow list related to network restrictions. you can specify multiple network addresses using comma separator.

operations.title: Delete Vendor Group
operations.description: Deletes a specific vendor group from BeyondTrust.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of vendor group which to be deleted from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: Specify ID of vendor group which to be deleted from BeyondTrust.

operations.title: Get User List in Vendor Group
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users in a vendor group based on the filter criteria like vendor group ID and any other details you have specified.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of the vendor group from which list of users you want to retrieve.
parameters.description: Specify ID of the vendor group from which list of users you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. It should be between 5 and 100.

operations.title: Create User in Vendor Group
operations.description: Creates a user in a vendor group based on the input parameters specified.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of the vendor group in which you want to create the user.
parameters.description: Specify ID of the vendor group from which you want to create the user.

parameters.name: username
parameters.title: Username
parameters.tooltip: Specify the username of user to be created in Vendor Group.
parameters.description: Specify the username of user to be created in Vendor Group.

parameters.name: public_display_name
parameters.title: Display Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the display name of user to be created in Vendor Group.
parameters.description: Specify the display name of user to be created in Vendor Group.

parameters.name: password
parameters.title: Password
parameters.tooltip: Specify the password of user to be created in Vendor Group.
parameters.description: Specify the password of user to be created in Vendor Group.

parameters.name: email_address
parameters.title: Email Address
parameters.tooltip: Specify the email address of user to be created in Vendor Group.
parameters.description: Specify the email address of user to be created in Vendor Group.

parameters.name: password_never_expire
parameters.title: Password Never Expire
parameters.tooltip: Set it to true if you want to password of user to never expire.
parameters.description: Set it to true if you want to password of user to never expire.

false.name: password_expiration
false.title: Password Expiration Date
false.tooltip: Specify the date and time at which the vendor user's password will expire.
false.description: Specify the date and time at which the vendor user's password will expire.

parameters.name: password_reset_next_login
parameters.title: Must Reset Password at Next Login
parameters.tooltip: Specify whether this vendor user's password must be reset on their next login.
parameters.description: Specify whether this vendor user's password must be reset on their next login. By default it is set as false.

parameters.name: account_disabled
parameters.title: Account Disabled
parameters.tooltip: Specify whether this account will be disabled. If true, the vendor user is not allowed to login
parameters.description: Specify whether this account will be disabled. If true, the vendor user is not allowed to login.

parameters.name: preferred_email_language
parameters.title: Preferred Email Language
parameters.tooltip: Specify the preferred email language of user to be created in Vendor Group.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the preferred email language of user to be created in Vendor Group. By default it is set to en-us.

operations.title: Get User Details in Vendor Group
operations.description: Retrieves details of user in a vendor group based on the user ID and vendor group ID you have specified.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of the vendor group from which list of users you want to retrieve.
parameters.description: Specify ID of the vendor group from which list of users you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.title: User ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of the user in vendor group whose details you want to retrieve.
parameters.description: Specify ID of the user in vendor group whose details you want to retrieve.

operations.title: Remove User from Vendor Group
operations.description: Removes user from a vendor group based on the user ID and vendor group ID you have specified.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.title: Vendor Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of the vendor group from which you want to remove the user.
parameters.description: Specify ID of the vendor group from which you want to remove the user.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.title: User ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of the user which you want to remove from specified vendor group.
parameters.description: Specify ID of the user which you want to remove from specified vendor group.

operations.title: Get Group Policy List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of group policies from BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name and pagination parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Policy Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify name of group policy which to be retrieved from BeyondTrust.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify name of group policy which to be retrieved from BeyondTrust. Note: policy name are always matched case-insensitively and exactly. No partial matches are allowed.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Page should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. It should be between 5 and 100.
